name: @marioslab/ulang
description: Virtual machine & assembler for recreational programming like it's 1992.

scripts.minify: esbuild --minify ulang-vm/dist/iife/ulang.js --outfile=ulang-vm/dist/iife/ulang.min.js && esbuild --allow-overwrite --minify ulang-site/assets/bundle/index.js --outfile=ulang-site/assets/bundle/index.js && esbuild --allow-overwrite --minify ulang-site/assets/bundle/editor.worker.js --outfile=ulang-site/assets/bundle/editor.worker.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf ulang-vm/dist && rm -f ulang-vm/src/ulang.* && rm -rf ulang-site/assets/bundle
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:modules && npm run build:ulang-vm && npm run build:ulang-site && npm run minify
scripts.build:modules: npx tsc --project ulang-vm && cp ulang-vm/src/ulang.js ulang-vm/dist
scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && concurrently "npx live-server --no-browser" "npm run dev:wasm" "npm run dev:ulang-vm" "npm run dev:ulang-site"

author: Mario Zechner
